title: Linear Convergence of Reshuffling Kaczmarz Methods With Sparse Constraints. (arXiv:2304.10123v1 [stat.ML])
abstract: The Kaczmarz method (KZ) and its variants, which are types of stochastic gradient descent (SGD) methods, have been extensively studied due to their simplicity and efficiency in solving linear equation systems. The iterative thresholding (IHT) method has gained popularity in various research fields, including compressed sensing or sparse linear regression, machine learning with additional structure, and optimization with nonconvex constraints. Recently, a hybrid method called Kaczmarz-based IHT (KZIHT) has been proposed, combining the benefits of both approaches, but its theoretical guarantees are missing. In this paper, we provide the first theoretical convergence guarantees for KZIHT by showing that it converges linearly to the solution of a system with sparsity constraints up to optimal statistical bias when the reshuffling data sampling scheme is used. translated_title: 稀疏约束下重洗Kaczmarz方法的线性收敛
translated_abstract: Kaczmarz方法（KZ）及其变体是一类随机梯度下降（SGD）方法，由于其简单高效地解决线性方程组而被广泛研究。迭代阈值（IHT）方法在多个研究领域中广受欢迎，包括压缩感知或稀疏线性回归，带有额外结构的机器学习以及带有非凸约束的优化。最近，提出了一种名为基于Kaczmarz的IHT（KZIHT）的混合方法，结合了两种方法的优点，但它的理论保证缺失。本文通过展示当使用重洗数据采样方案时，KZIHT线性地收敛到具有稀疏约束的系统的解，并提供了KZIHT的第一个理论收敛保证。我们还提出了Kaczmarz周期阈值（KZPT）方法，它通过应用阈值操作来推广KZIHT。
tldr: 本文提出了一种基于Kaczmarz的IHT（KZIHT）的混合方法，并在使用重洗数据采样方案时证明其线性收敛性，具有稀疏约束的系统的解。同时，还提出了Kaczmarz周期阈值（KZPT）方法推广了KZIHT的应用。
en_tdlr: This paper proposes a hybrid method based on Kaczmarz and IHT called KZIHT and provides the first theoretical convergence guarantee. The KZIHT method converges linearly to the solution of a system with sparsity constraints using the reshuffling data sampling scheme. The paper also introduces the KZPT method which generalizes the application of KZIHT.
